references.paper_title: BERT: Pre-training of deep bidirectional transformers for language understanding
references.reason: This paper introduces BERT, a foundational model for many NLP tasks, and its impact on Turkish NLP is explored in this paper.

references.paper_title: Exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer
references.reason: This paper introduces the T5 model, the architecture used by TURNA, a significant model for Turkish NLP evaluated in this work.
This paper introduces the UL2 framework, which underpins TURNA, a model crucial to this study.

references.paper_title: Deep learning-based Dependency Parsing for Turkish
references.reason: This is a PhD thesis foundational to the dependency parsing work in this paper.

references.paper_title: Named entity recognition and classification in historical documents: A survey
references.reason: This survey paper provides important background and context for the NER work on historical texts.
